SEARCH
Package model

Class Application

java.lang.Object
model.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Application extends Object implements Serializable
Entity class representing an Application for an internship by a student.

Applications track the lifecycle of a student's request to join an internship opportunity, from initial submission through approval or rejection by the company representative, and potential placement acceptance by the student.

Key Business Rules:

  • All applications start with PENDING status
  • Company representatives can approve (→ SUCCESSFUL) or reject (→ REJECTED)
  • Students can only accept placement for SUCCESSFUL applications
  • Maximum 3 applications per student at any time
  • Accepting one placement automatically withdraws all other applications
  • Applications can be withdrawn by student (requires staff approval)

Status Flow:

 PENDING → SUCCESSFUL (approved by company) → Placement Accepted
        → REJECTED (rejected by company)
        → WITHDRAWN (student request or automatic)
Since:
2025-10-14
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

  • Field Details

    • serialVersionUID

      private static final long serialVersionUID
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • applicationId

      private String applicationId
      Unique identifier for the application. Generated automatically by the system.

    • studentId

      private String studentId
      User ID of the student who submitted this application.

    • opportunityId

      private String opportunityId
      ID of the internship opportunity being applied for.

    • status

      private ApplicationStatus status
      Current status of the application. Default: PENDING

    • submissionDate

      private LocalDateTime submissionDate
      Date and time when the application was submitted.

    • statusUpdateDate

      private LocalDateTime statusUpdateDate
      Date and time when the application status was last updated. Null if never updated after submission.

    • placementAccepted

      private boolean placementAccepted
      Flag indicating if the student has accepted the internship placement. Only applicable when status is SUCCESSFUL.

    • placementAcceptanceDate

      private LocalDateTime placementAcceptanceDate
      Date and time when the placement was accepted by the student. Null if placement not yet accepted.

    • representativeComments

      private String representativeComments
      Comments or feedback from the company representative. Optional field for rejection reasons or approval notes.

      public boolean acceptPlacement()

      Returns:
      true if placement was accepted successfully, false otherwise

    • canChangeStatus

      public boolean canChangeStatus()

      Returns:
      true if status is PENDING

      Returns:
      true if status is not WITHDRAWN
